title: Villas at Viking Road Senior Apt.
map_address: 3513 E. Viking Road near Flamingo & Pecose
posting_body: Villas at Viking Road senior apartment community is created exclusively for seniors 55 plus.
Home like Single story attached One bedroom & One bedroom Deluxe.
Villas at Viking Road is a pet friendly community that combines the conveniences of premier independent living with the advantages of a rental community.
Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, spacious living and dining area and washer and dryer in the unit.
Resident centered areas include a pool, and spa, a wellness center, game room/TV and reading room as well as large community.
We are conveniently located in an attractive, tranquil area of Las Vegas with the added convenience of restaurants, casinos and shopping close by.
Lease today and learn why our residents love to call us home!
-Located close to many stores and the strip
